column1: 21709,Ultimate X-Men (2000) #97,97,47025,45,"The battle lines of Ultimatum are drawn! Who is the true power behind Banshee? What is their connection to Wolverine and the X-Men?  The answers will make the X-Men reconsider everything they've ever believed in!  How can one ever be human again after being a god? It's the shocking finale by Aron E. Coleite (TV's Heroes) and Mark Brooks! ,2008,8
